item.description: We will be holding a New Years Eve Hokke Senbo Service to purify ourselves for the upcoming year. At midnight we will be ringing the bell 108 times which is the tradition in many Buddhist Temples. There will be traditional New Years snacks available. We have some space for those who would like to stay at the Temple this night and join the morning New Years day Blessing Service. If you are interested please talk to Ryuoh Shonin. This is a wonderful way to start the New Year.
item.name: New Years Eve Retreat and Service
